Extra-Curriculars

The work I've done for school clubs and organizations!

AMACSS CSCA08 Review Seminar

I created and presented lecture slides to 200+ students to help them review for their CSCA08 Final Exam. I covered Introductory Computer Science topics such as Dictionaries, mutability, loops, files and their operations and UnitTesting.

View Seminar Slides

AMACSS CSCA48 Study Guide

I collaboratively created a study guide with another AMACSS computer science representative to help 200+ students to review for their CSCA48 Midterm Exam. We covered Introductory Computer Science topics such as the Memory Model, Array and String methods, Linked Lists and Operations and differences between Python and C.

View Study Guide
